mapper.insert: /** NetworkMapper.addNetwork **/ INSERT INTO wifi_network ( user_seq, ssid, password, auth_type, hidden_yn, alias, memo, active_yn, guest_yn ) VALUES ( #{userSeq}, #{ssid}, #{password}, #{authType}, #{hiddenYn}, #{alias}, #{memo}, #{activeYn}, #{guestYn} )
mapper.select: SELECT network_seq , user_seq , ssid , password , auth_type , hidden_yn FROM wifi_network WHERE 1=1 AND network_seq = #{networkSeq} AND hidden_yn = "N" AND active_yn = "Y"
